name: Scroll Driver Lite
summary:
Scroll Driver is a fun time-based vertical scroller driving game that makes use of the iPhone's accelerometer.
The object of the game is to navigate your car along a straight road that is littered with obstacles as fast as you can without crashing. There is a leader board, so your best times are stored.
This is my first iPhone game so the game play is quite simple. I am adding new features and game play based on comments and feed back from the community.
